actions.name: Beak
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (2d4 + 3) piercing damage.

special_abilities.name: Falcon Dive
special_abilities.desc: If the falcon is flying and dives at least 20 feet straight toward a target, it has advantage on the next attack roll it makes against that target before the end of its turn. If the attack hits, it deals an extra 2 (1d4) damage to the target.

special_abilities.name: Keen Sight
special_abilities.desc: The falcon has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.
